inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: narrowing of the glenohumeral joint space, marginal osteophytes around the humeral head, progressive changes with sclerosis and subcortical cystic formation and flattening of the humeral head

inclusion.criterion: intact rotator cuff but with atrophy or fatty degeneration
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Grade II atrophy noted on preoperative shoulder ultrasound

inclusion.criterion: objective weakness as measured with Isobex testing
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients who present with pain secondary to inflammatory arthropathy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients who had previous rotator cuff repair or prior open surgery prior to shoulder arthroplasty
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a well-dressed and well-nourished adolescent who is alert and cooperative. The left shoulder is slightly higher than the right shoulder.
